price: 13 Tout ce qui vit le jour et la nuit Lui appartient. Il est Celui qui entend tout et sait tout.
arabic: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
